name: Windows Live Movie Maker Project
summary: A WLMP file is a movie project created by Windows Live Movie Maker, a program that allows users to create movies and slideshows. It contains paths to video, movie transitions, images, music, and effects featured in the movie project. WLMP files do not contain the actual content that appears in the movie project, only links to the content.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
